mapper.select: select (@rowNO := @rowNO+1) as rowNo, a.* from vb_forum_asker a, (select @rowNO :=0) x
select (@rowNO := @rowNO+1) as rowNo, a.* from vb_forum_asker a, (select @rowNO :=0) x where asker = #{id}
select no, context, a, b, c, d, answer, analysis, exam_type_name, source from vb_question_detail where no = #{questionId}
select count(question_id) from tb_forum_response where question_id = #{questionId}
select u.nick_name from tb_forum_asker a left join tu_user u on u.id = a.asker where question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.update: update tb_forum_response set system_choose = #{systemChoose} where question_id = #{questionId}
update tb_forum_asker set asker = #{oldUserId} where asker = #{newUserId}
